sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xiao bian bu tong 小便不通①. Lan shi mi cang 蘭室秘藏 Last juan 治小便閉塞不 通，乃血澀致氣不通而竅澀也 , “To cure blocked urination , this is roughness of the blood leading to a roughness of the aperture that blocks the flow of qi”. Xiao bian bi zhang 小便閉脹 , minor relief blockedblocked urination with distension [1] Illness Sign identical with xiao bian bu tong 小便不通①, blocked urination. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry cong 蔥 quoting Lei zheng pu ji ben shi fang 類證普濟本事方 3: 治小便難，小腸脹 , “It cures difficult urination and small intestine distension”, writes: 小便閉脹 , “ Blocked urination with distension ”.
